column5: My place is close to the beach. Youâ€™ll love it because it's very Safe, Quiet, a few blocks from Sylvan Beach on Galveston Bay. La Porte is a historic city with antiques stores, 10 min from Kemah, 20 min from NASA, 25 min from NRG Stadium and Downtown Houston, 15 min from the tallest monument in the world (Guiness book). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
